name: Wasteland Karma System
description: Dynamic reputation system that tracks player morality and affects questline availability

karma_levels.title: Demon Spawn
karma_levels.description: The wasteland fears your very name. Even raiders think you're too much.
consequences: Can only work with evil factions (Raiders, Legion, slavers)
Merchants refuse service or charge 300% markup

karma_levels.title: Scourge
karma_levels.description: You're known for cruelty and selfishness across the wasteland.
consequences: Good companions leave if karma drops further

karma_levels.title: Opportunist
karma_levels.description: You look out for number one, often at others' expense.
consequences: Reduced caps rewards from good factions

karma_levels.title: Mercenary
karma_levels.description: You walk the line between good and evil, judged by actions alone.
consequences: Some extreme faction quests locked (both good and evil)

karma_levels.title: Defender
karma_levels.description: You're known as someone who helps those in need.

karma_levels.title: Savior
karma_levels.description: The wasteland sees you as a beacon of hope.
consequences: Raiders and slavers attack on sight

karma_levels.title: Messiah
karma_levels.description: Legends will be told of your heroism for generations.
consequences: Cannot work with any evil factions
Enormous expectations - failure hurts reputation badly

questline_karma_locks.description: Questlines that lock based on karma decisions

permanent_locks.message: The Brotherhood has declared you an enemy of humanity. There is no redemption.

permanent_locks.reason: Raiders see you as a threat to their way of life
permanent_locks.message: Raiders attack you on sight. You're too 'good' for their world.
The Institute requires... control. Prove you can be disciplined.

permanent_locks.reason: NCR cannot promote known war criminals
permanent_locks.message: The NCR demands you atone for your crimes before advancement.
The Railroad needs heroes, not opportunists. Change your ways.

conditional_locks.lock_message: Ghouls will never trust you after what you did.
conditional_locks.realignment_description: Rescue 20 ghouls from persecution to earn forgiveness
Defeat anti-mutant extremists and donate 1000 caps to mutant settlement

conditional_locks.lock_message: You're marked as a synth hunter. The Railroad wants you dead.
conditional_locks.realignment_description: Free 10 synths and destroy Institute tracking systems

karma_realignment_mechanics.description: How players can recover from bad karma
base_rules: Karma below -500 requires MAJOR good deeds to climb back
Each good deed at low karma is worth 50% more
Each evil deed at high karma costs double
Realignment quests become available at certain thresholds
Some locks are permanent - no coming back

realignment_quests.description: A former raider turned monk offers you a path to redemption through service
requirements: Free all slaves in 3 slaver camps
realignment_quests.unlocks: Neutral factions now willing to talk

realignment_quests.description: One massive selfless act to prove you've changed
requirements: Sacrifice rare item to save settlement
Give up wealth to fund hospital

realignment_quests.description: Only the most extreme sacrifice can wash away your sins
requirements: Destroy all raider gangs in region
Donate all possessions except basic gear
realignment_quests.warning: This is the ONLY way back from Very Evil

companion_karma_reactions.description: How companions react to player karma changes

rules.warning_message: I don't know if I can keep following you down this path...
rules.leave_message: I can't be part of this anymore. Goodbye.

rules.warning_message: You're scaring me. This isn't who I thought you were.
You're getting soft. I don't work with bleeding hearts.
rules.leave_message: You're too 'good' for me now. Find another saint to travel with.

visual_indicators.karma_display: Pip-Boy STATUS screen shows current karma level and title
visual_indicators.npc_reactions: NPCs comment on your reputation when you approach
visual_indicators.quest_markers: Locked quests show karma requirement in red
visual_indicators.realignment_progress: Track progress toward redemption in journal

integration_notes.wallet_connection: Player karma can tie to wallet address - persistent across sessions
integration_notes.blockchain_tracking: Major karma milestones (Messiah, Demon Spawn) can be NFT achievements
integration_notes.character_creation: Starting karma based on trait selection during character creation
integration_notes.fractured_timeline: Karma separate per timeline - can be evil in one era, good in another
